title: Build an email list from LinkedIn users
snippet:
I need someone to help me build an email list / database based on LinkedIn Users
Essential experience in database building, lead generation, database building. 
Process for Hire: 
- Please provide list of 20 for test (based on the list we will provide)
- Delivery will be csv 
- Containing email address, first name, title, company name, LinkedIn​ profile 
- After cleaning we will test & hire for 500 contacts (and in second stage for 1000 contacts). 
Experience: Created similar lists in the last 12 months from LinkedIn
